reviewText:
Really?  I can't believe what I paid for a 14 minute video of a pre-recorded TV show.  They charged close to $18 bucks for this?
Geeeesh.  He's a geek.  And a poker faced one at that. Yes he's rich now but based on a few facts in this video he's not necessarily ready for prime time.
Buy it if you can justify the price, but you can probably find it on utube.
This is a wonderful DVD.  It is less than 60 minutes long.  I believe it is about 25 minutes long.  But still and all I found it informative.
